form.title: Platform Details
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe your platform and its key features (max 500 characters)
form.featuresPlaceholder: e.g., API access, Custom models, Free tier
form.logoNote: Recommended: Square logo, minimum 200x200px (PNG or SVG preferred)
form.termsAgree: I agree to the Terms and Conditions for platform listings
form.requiredNote: * Required fields. All submissions will be reviewed before being published. This typically takes 3-5 business days.
